title: 【ROUTER筆記】華碩router安裝shadowsocks-libev server shell script

replies.msg:
之前寫個呢個post手動安裝shadowsocks-libev

https://lihkg.com/thread/653915/page/1

後嚟出現好多問題，有人反映明明有個file，點解shell會話not find，於是自己寫個自動script安裝，發現原来pastebin下載嘅files會變咗dos/windows格式，導致script無法執行，原因係多咗個 CRLF line terminators

同各位巴絲打講聲sorry先，冇測試過就寫出嚟

寫咗個自動安裝shell script, 需要有幾樣自己手動嘅先用到
1. flash咗router做asuswrt-merlin
2. DDNS要自己申請
3. 已安裝咗entware-ng, 裝喺sda1 , 如果係其他要自己改script嘅path
4. 只係喺asus rt-ac68u merlin firmware 384_2試驗

內容

#! /bin/sh
# $PROG: semi-automatic shell script for installing shadowsocks-libev server on asus router.
# $REQUIRE: Asuswrt-merlin installed and entware-ng is installed on /mnt/sda1
# assume router's DDNS service is active
# Tested on asus RT-AC68U powered by asuswrt-merlin version 384_2
# No guarantee & responsibility to the author. Use at your own risk.

# pick server port from 17900 - 17999 randomly
server_port="179$(head -n 30 /dev/urandom | tr -dc "0123456789" | head -c2)"

# generate password
ss_passwd=$(openssl rand -base64 32 | tr -d '+/0oO' | cut -c5-14)

RET=0
myip=$(wget -qO- ifconfig.co)
url="https://pastebin.com/raw/PehUx1qY"
config="shadowsocks.json"

opkg install shadowsocks-libev-ss-server

if [ x$(which dos2unix) = x ] ; then
        opkg install dos2unix
fi

cd /jffs/scripts || {
        echo "Cannot change path to /jffs/scripts" ;
        echo "Exit install progress." ;
        exit 1 ;
}

if [ -f "firewall-start" ] ; then
        echo "iptables -I INPUT -p tcp --dport $server_port -j ACCEPT" >> firewall-start
        echo "iptables -I INPUT -p udp --dport $server_port -j ACCEPT" >> firewall-start
        echo "ip6tables -I INPUT -p tcp --dport $server_port -j ACCEPT" >> firewall-start
        echo "ip6tables -I INPUT -p udp --dport $server_port -j ACCEPT" >> firewall-start
else
        echo "#! /bin/sh" > firewall-start
        echo "iptables -I INPUT -p tcp --dport $server_port -j ACCEPT" >> firewall-start
        echo "iptables -I INPUT -p udp --dport $server_port -j ACCEPT" >> firewall-start
        echo "ip6tables -I INPUT -p tcp --dport $server_port -j ACCEPT" >> firewall-start
        echo "ip6tables -I INPUT -p udp --dport $server_port -j ACCEPT" >> firewall-start
fi

chmod 755 firewall-start

echo "/jffs/scripts/ss-init start" >> services-start
echo "/jffs/scripts/ss-init stop" >> services-stop
wget --no-check-certificate -qO ss-init "$url" && dos2unix ss-init && chmod 755 ss-init

cd /mnt/sda1/entware/etc || { echo "Fail change path /mnt/sda1/entware/etc/" ; exit 1 ; }

echo "{" > "$config"
echo "    \"server\":\"0.0.0.0\"," >> "$config"
echo "    \"server_port\":${server_port}," >> "$config"
echo "    \"local_port\":1080," >> "$config"
echo "    \"password\":\"${ss_passwd}\"," >> "$config"
echo "    \"timeout\":60," >> "$config"
echo "    \"method\":\"chacha20-ietf-poly1305\"" >> "$config"
echo "}" >> "$config"

/jffs/scripts/firewall-start ; sleep 1

/jffs/scripts/ss-init start ; sleep 1

ss_id=$(ps w | awk '$5 ~ /ss-server/{print $1}')

if [ -n "$ss_id" ]
        then
                echo "Setup is completed."
                echo "Shadowsocks-libev is up."
                echo "Your IP:          $myip"
                echo "Server Port:      $server_port"
                echo "Password:         $ss_passwd"
                echo "Method:           chacha20-ietf-poly1305"
        else
                echo "Install shadowsocks-libev server failed."
                RET=2
fi

exit $RET


如果copy & paste最好喺router嘅ssh用nano／vim，喺windows用notepad++轉為做unix格式，save之後

chmod +x filename && ./filename

執行嘅log
https://pastebin.com/raw/KzKTmA6w

如果用github擺script就唔會有呢樣問題，不過我個github已3年冇update，好多安裝script已經冇用，或唔使用都得，懶得用git

如果喺pastebin copy & paste/download番嚟嘅code有問題，請用dos2unix，sed改吓格式

dos2unix whatever_file


或

sed  -i  's/\r$//g'  whatever_file


消除咗喺file嘅 \r
謝Vic 巴

quote.msg: 謝Vic 巴

replies.msg:
非常抱歉，原來pastebin網頁會變咗windows/dos文件格式，噚晚剷晒ss啲嘢寫shell script先發現

如果之前有手動安裝過，剷走

/mnt/sda1/entware/etc/shadowsocks 呢個directory
編輯 services-start 同 services-stop 裡面同ss-server有關嘅開關語句

編輯firewall-start, delete咗同ss-server有關命令，如果冇其他命令，直接剷走都得

再opkg remove shadowsocks-libev-ss-server

新寫嘅shell script會自動gen port同password,同寫入 shadowsocks.json

ss執行嘅log喺 /mnt/sda1/entware/tmp

shadowsocks.json 喺 /mnt/sda1/entware/etc
用busybox嘅ash寫，要調動多啲外部program,用bash/zsh寫就唔使，用POSIX shell語法寫，任何有POSIX shell裝置應該冇問題
啱啱睇log，似乎要安裝多個haveged令shadowsocks-libev嘅加密算法更加random好啲，晏少少搞埋佢更新吓script

updated version, 安裝埋haveged daemon

#! /bin/sh
# $PROG: semi-automatic shell script for installing shadowsocks-libev server on asus router.
# $REQUIRE: Asuswrt-merlin installed and entware-ng is installed on /mnt/sda1
# assume router's DDNS service is active
# Tested on asus RT-AC68U powered by asuswrt-merlin version 384_2
# No guarantee & responsibility to the author. Use at your own risk.

# pick server port from 17900 - 17999 randomly
server_port="179$(head -n 30 /dev/urandom | tr -dc "0123456789" | head -c2)"

# generate password
ss_passwd=$(openssl rand -base64 32 | tr -d '+/0oO' | cut -c5-14)

RET=0
myip=$(wget -qO- ifconfig.co)
url="https://pastebin.com/raw/PehUx1qY"
url2="https://pastebin.com/raw/jfKPER4R"
config="shadowsocks.json"

opkg install haveged
opkg install shadowsocks-libev-ss-server

if [ x$(which dos2unix) = x ] ; then
        opkg install dos2unix
fi

cd /jffs/scripts || {
        echo "Cannot change path to /jffs/scripts" ;
        echo "Exit install progress." ;
        exit 1 ;
}

if [ -f "firewall-start" ] ; then
        echo "iptables -I INPUT -p tcp --dport $server_port -j ACCEPT" >> firewall-start
        echo "iptables -I INPUT -p udp --dport $server_port -j ACCEPT" >> firewall-start
        echo "ip6tables -I INPUT -p tcp --dport $server_port -j ACCEPT" >> firewall-start
        echo "ip6tables -I INPUT -p udp --dport $server_port -j ACCEPT" >> firewall-start
else
        echo "#! /bin/sh" > firewall-start
        echo "iptables -I INPUT -p tcp --dport $server_port -j ACCEPT" >> firewall-start
        echo "iptables -I INPUT -p udp --dport $server_port -j ACCEPT" >> firewall-start
        echo "ip6tables -I INPUT -p tcp --dport $server_port -j ACCEPT" >> firewall-start
        echo "ip6tables -I INPUT -p udp --dport $server_port -j ACCEPT" >> firewall-start
fi

chmod 755 firewall-start

echo "/jffs/scripts/haveged-init start" >> services-start
echo "/jffs/scripts/ss-init start" >> services-start
echo "/jffs/scripts/haveged-init stop" >> services-stop
echo "/jffs/scripts/ss-init stop" >> services-stop

wget --no-check-certificate -qO haveged-init "$url2" && dos2unix haveged-init && chmod 755 haveged-init
wget --no-check-certificate -qO ss-init "$url" && dos2unix ss-init && chmod 755 ss-init

cd /mnt/sda1/entware/etc || { echo "Fail change path /mnt/sda1/entware/etc/" ; exit 1 ; }

echo "{" > "$config"
echo "    \"server\":\"0.0.0.0\"," >> "$config"
echo "    \"server_port\":${server_port}," >> "$config"
echo "    \"local_port\":1080," >> "$config"
echo "    \"password\":\"${ss_passwd}\"," >> "$config"
echo "    \"timeout\":60," >> "$config"
echo "    \"method\":\"chacha20-ietf-poly1305\"" >> "$config"
echo "}" >> "$config"

/jffs/scripts/firewall-start ; sleep 1

/jffs/scripts/haveged-init start ; sleep 1

/jffs/scripts/ss-init start ; sleep 1

ss_id=$(ps w | awk '$5 ~ /ss-server/{print $1}')

if [ -n "$ss_id" ]
        then
                echo "Setup is completed."
                echo "Shadowsocks-libev is up."
                echo "Your IP:          $myip"
                echo "Server Port:      $server_port"
                echo "Password:         $ss_passwd"
                echo "Method:           chacha20-ietf-poly1305"
        else
                echo "Install shadowsocks-libev server failed."
                RET=2
fi

exit $RET


shadowsocks-libev與及haveged 檢查狀況



shadowsocks.log

replies.msg:
我冇裝Adblock，如果怕用ssh 命令行，可能要諗諗裝唔裝

Flash Merlin好易，同update原廠firmware一樣，login入去更新韌體頁面就得，之後去download putty/kitty之類

用ssh login入router，然後安裝entware-ng，跟手冊做就得，呢個網站有圖睇點裝entware-ng https://hqt.ro

用其他系統嘅ssh client都得，例如用iPad嘅iTerminal Pro咁，命令列玩法係what you see is what you type，玩玩吓就會

shadowsocks有自己客戶端，iOS嘅app store下載就得，有啲要俾錢買，我用緊shadowsrocket，以前強國一個中學生寫嘅，收8蚊，而家唔知幾錢，可能都大學畢業移民走埋佬

呢度有各種系統嘅shadowsocks client介紹 https://shadowsocks.org/en/download/clients.html

呢個殘體 -> https://crifan.github.io/scientific_network_summary/website/server_client_mode/ss_client/client_ios.html

Unwire介紹 https://unwire.hk/2017/08/07/shadowsocksr-ios/tips-2/

記住唔好用提供shadowsocks-libev/SSR/V2Ray server嘅client，有6成以上ios app store嘅vpn同呢類嘢係支共俾資金，要安全自己起

replies.msg:
#7 係自動安裝shell script update version，喺router將上面內容copy & paste改成可執行就得

opkg install nano
nano install

copy & paste然後㩒Ctrl-X ，問你係咪save，撳y

然後

chmod +x install && ./install

如果copy & paste都懶，copy 呢句命令執行

wget --no-check-certificate -qO install 'https://pastebin.com/raw/fdzT8NJp' && dos2unix install && chmod +x install && ./install

#7 係自動安裝shell script update version，喺router將上面內容copy & paste改成可執行就得

opkg install nano
nano install

copy & paste然後㩒Ctrl-X ，問你係咪save，撳y

然後

chmod +x install && ./install

如果copy & paste都懶，copy 呢句命令執行

wget --no-check-certificate -qO install 'https://pastebin.com/raw/fdzT8NJp' && dos2unix install && chmod +x install && ./install


係咁

replies.msg: 晏啲試下
支持樓王

簡單講吓手動點搞，其實個shell script都係做呢啲動作嘅啫

呢度假設你已經將router刷咗做asuswrt-merlin,並根據手冊安裝咗entware-ng

https://github.com/RMerl/asuswrt-merlin/wiki/Entware

正常就會有一個entware嘅file, 喺 /mnt/sda1/entware

裏面就係entware-ng嘅software，通過佢嘅管理套件工具，opkg就可以擴充router嘅功能

安裝咗entware之後，喺/jffs/scripts呢個path就有3個files
post-mount services-stop services-start

呢個位置係router永久儲存位置，容許用戶寫自己嘅User Scripts

https://github.com/RMerl/asuswrt-merlin/wiki/User-scripts

https://github.com/RMerl/asuswrt-merlin/wiki/JFFS

用戶就可以利用寫一啲開機啟動服務，熄機停止服務嘅命令

手動安裝shadowsocks-libev-ss-server過程如下
1. ssh username@192.168.1.1
2. opkg install haveged
3. opkg install shadowsocks-libev-ss-server
4. cd /jffs/scripts
5. opkg install nano
6. nano firewall-start 加入
#! /bin/sh
iptables -I INPUT -p tcp --dport 17941 -j ACCEPT
iptables -I INPUT -p udp --dport 17941 -j ACCEPT
ip6tables -I INPUT -p tcp --dport 17941 -j ACCEPT
ip6tables -I INPUT -p udp --dport 17941 -j ACCEPT

dport後面嘅port要對應返shadowsocks-libev嘅port 

chmod +x firewall-start


下載我寫嘅shell warpper, 擺係 /jffs/scripts

wget --no-check-certificate -qO haveged-init 'https://pastebin.com/raw/jfKPER4R' && dos2unix haveged-init && chmod +x haveged

wget --no-check-certificate -qO ss-init 'https://pastebin.com/PehUx1qY' && dos2unix ss-init && chmod +x ss-init


安裝咗shadowsocks-libev-ss-server之後，佢會有一個名為shadowsocks.json嘅file喺 /mnt/sda1/entware/etc呢個path,如果冇嘅自己制造一個

nano /mnt/sda1/entware/etc/shadowsocks.json


內容如是

{
    "server":"0.0.0.0",
    "server_port":17941,
    "local_port":1080,
    "password":"ChangeToYourPasswordHere",
    "timeout":60,
    "method":"chacha20-ietf-poly1305"
}


喺/jffs/scripts/services-start 行尾加入,一句一行

/jffs/scripts/haveged-init start
/jffs/scripts/ss-init start


之後喺/jffs/scripts/services-stop 行尾加入，一句一行

/jffs/scripts/haveged-init stop
/jffs/scripts/ss-init stop


執行如下命令

/jffs/scripts/firewall-start 
/jffs/scripts/haveged-init start
/jffs/scripts/ss-init start


完成，如果唔想打咁多字，好以做個short cut，輸入下面命令

ln -s /jffs/scripts/haveged-init /opt/bin/
ln -s /jffs/scripts/ss-init /opt/bin



其實就完成，shadowsocks-libev會輸出log，喺/mnt/sda1/entware/tmp

啱啱睇到自己以前寫咗個shell script簡單查IP location嘅，內容如是

#! /bin/sh

ip_lookup="$*"
url="http://geoiplookup.net/ip"
prog=`basename $0`
usage="USAGE:  $prog IP IP2 .... IPn"
if echo "${ip_lookup}" | grep -E '^[1-9][0-9]{0,2}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}$' > /dev/null 2>&1 ; then
   :
else
   echo "$usage" >&2
   exit 5
fi

for i in `echo $ip_lookup`
   do
     _info=`curl -s "$url/$i" | sed -n '/IP Address:/{n;p};/Country:/{n;p};/City:/{n;p}'`

    echo "${_info}" | sed 's/<[^>]*>//g'
    echo
done
exit 0




個站仲未執笠，用得

好詳盡




但仲未裝到shawdowsocks

replies.msg:
4G 唔同IP，要開另1個port，開過另1張 json運行

ss-init 要加多1行執行句，我冇4G router，測唔到

加多個config.json 喺 /mnt/sda1/entware/etc， 內容照辦，port唔同，其他一樣都得，客戶端就要用IP或另一個DDNS

/jffs/scripts/ss-init 要加多一個唔同名變數，例如 CONFIG2=''/mnt/sda1/entware/etc/config,json''

係do_start 個function 加多1行相同嘅執行命令，$CONFIG 改為 $CONFIG2

應該就得

replies.msg:
用SSH Remote app
佢淨係show咗句command executed

我用l2tp/IPSec VPN入返屋企內網，再用ssh client login router,唔係用ssh remote,如果用ssh remote要加返命令，同埋ssh allow WAN login先得

我嘅router同NAS喺WAN係冇得直接login, 只有LAN先可以login,所以要通過VPN令電話入咗LAN先用ssh client

replies.msg: 一時時嘅，例如嗰輪共匪搞黑社會大會，可能會block，因為GFW嘅硬件都有極限，Netfilter/iptables block一段時間要釋放，否則多多RAM都唔夠，佢都會hang，除非好似Twitter/google呢類域名同IP，係永久block，其他DDNS未必，noip我記憶中block咗

replies.msg:
/jffs/scripts/ss-init status/start/stop

如果冇自動起動，手動執行 /jffs/scripts/ss-init start



要睇返port同password

cat /mnt/sda1/entware/etc/shadowsocks.json

replies.msg:
可以自行手動改port、password同method，然後停咗服務再重新起動ss就得

呢5種 encryption method 是但一款比較好

aes-128-gcm
aes-192-gcm
aes-256-gcm
chacha20-ietf-poly1305
xchacha20-ietf-poly1305
